## Attach packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

## Find derivatives using R

```{r}
# Define expression
fx <- expression(x^2)
pa <- expression(2*(3*a + 2)^4 - 5)

# Compute derivative
df_dx <- D(expr = fx, name = "x")
df_dx

dp_da <- D(expr = pa, name = "a")
dp_da

# Evaluate at x = 3
x <- 3
eval(df_dx)

a <- 1.2
eval(dp_da)
```

## Penguin plot pt2

```{r}
#head(penguins)
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = species)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("darkorange","purple","cyan4")) +
  labs(x = "Bill Length (mm)", y = "Bill Depth (mm)", title = "Bill Length vs Depth (mm)")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = species, y = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_jitter() +
  labs(x = "Species", 
       y = "Flipper Length (mm)",
       title = "Species vs Flipper Length (mm)"
       )
```
